pages.text: $(li)The Feeding Trought is a block that allows you to automatizate creatures breeding.$(br)$(li)First, place it, right click on it and fill it with food, like $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat)Wheat$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat_seeds)Seeds$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/carrot)Carrots$(/l).
$(li)Nearby creatures which can be feeded with the food that you added will eat the food and then they will enter in a love mode.
